ygData.subject: UriUniqFilter : which one to choose Bdb or Bloom?

Hi,

I was getting Out of Memory Error and was able to fix it by setting
de=
cent values for JVM heap space and bdbModule.cachePercent. Reading
Heritrix=
's yahoo group, I noticed that BloomUriUniqFilter is sometimes
used instead=
 of BdbUriUniqFilter. Is there a general rule of dumb for
choosing one over=
 the other?

Bertrand

PS : The Javadoc of BloomUriUniqFilter refers to
htt=
p://crawler.archive.org/cgi-bin/wiki.pl?AlreadySeen but sadly there
is noth=
ing readable there.
